thread.title: BMW and LEGO collaborated to create the concept hoverbike of our dreams
thread.title_full: BMW and LEGO collaborated to create the concept hoverbike of our dreams

author: Nikolay Nikolov
title: BMW and LEGO collaborated to create the concept hoverbike of our dreams
text:
Social Good Summit BMW and LEGO collaborated to create the concept hoverbike of our dreams 
LEGO and BMW teamed up to create a model set for one of the automaker's most popular motorcycles â€“ BMW R 1200 GS Adventure. 
Lego Technic engineers used the same 603 pieces from the model to construct a concept hoverbike. Then, their colleagues at BMW, impressed by the design, built a life-sized replica of the futuristic bike. Nikolay Nikolov
